channel.title: Erm, Okay..? (I really need help guys)
channel.description:
Alright, yea, I know my first post is in the help section, and i'm sorry. But, i'm really confused at this point. Alright, i've used Pimpscape to base my server off of and I have edited it and made it pretty nice. But, theres a problem, I Port-Forwarded, and everything, yet.. I can log in with my No-Ip, but NOBODY else can.. I type in grr.no-ip.org in the server IP and I get in and it gives me the Player accepted stuff, and everything. But, NOBODY else can get in! Well, I think you guys will like the server if I get it up, and I'd really like it if you helped me get it up. You can post here or add me on msn, I prefer MSN, human_prodigy@hotmail.com
Here's what i'm offering. If you help me fix my server and get it runnable "yay" I will give you admin status in my server, something i'd usually make people pay 500k for.
Thanks ;D

item.title: Erm, Okay..? (I really need help guys)
item.dc:creator: @analrape analrape
item.description:
@analrape wrote:

[quote=“The_prodigy, post:6, topic:75553”]Okay, well, some guy tried to run me through getting a static IP, turns out i already have one. So, i still need some help guys! I can connect to the IP but NOBODY else can. grr.no-ip.org, try it![/quote]u where acting like a dick,whing to give ure IP to me soicould help u,or u port forwarded rong or u setted the rong ip into ure no-ip adress

Read full topic
item.source: Erm, Okay..? (I really need help guys)

item.title: Erm, Okay..? (I really need help guys)
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Nate Mod Nate
item.description:
@Mod_Nate wrote:

Becuase port forwarding doesnt do anything unless your trying to get like more than 100 people in a server…and i dont think you are…

Read full topic

2.) Yes, they are using the correct port ( The default )
3.) Erm, why is it a waste of time… -.-

item.title: Erm, Okay..? (I really need help guys)
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Nate Mod Nate
item.description:
@Mod_Nate wrote:

1.) Selling admin is illegal.
2.) Make Sure they are useing right port.
3.) You do not need to port forward its a extreme waste of time.
